title: "Date With the Knight"Transliteration: "Dēto Wizu za Naito" (Japanese:デート・ウィズ・ザ・ナイト)
transformers_text: Date With the Knight Transliteration D to Wiz u za Naito Japanese Dear Kara Kara approaches Nico to seek help to reconstruct a letter from her deceased mother that her father shredded Nico Mori hito and Kara work together to restore it which reveals Kara's mother was not actually her birth mother However Kara feels that this revelation does not change their relationship and she reconciles with her father Afterward an inspired Nico puts up an advertisement in school so anybody can come seek her assistance New Friends A classmate of Kan shi's named Jun Hora i approaches Nico for help in talking to a girl he likes He successfully starts dating Ann Ni kura the girl in question who talks in a similar stilted fashion They gift Nico and Mori hito a pair of movie tickets as thanks Date With the Knight Nico gets anxious about her upcoming date with Mori hito as she finds it difficult to read his emotions With his consent Nico casts a spell on Mori hito that creates a miniature version of him that expresses the emotions he feels Mori hito later admits that he was conditioned to be stoic due to his training but he feels that he has started to become more expressive with Nico and his new friends around
